greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A005185(n+1-A005185(n)).
comment: For n >= 2, a(n) gives the left hand summand for the term q(n+1) of Hofstadter Q-sequence (A005185): q(1) = q(2) = 1; q(n) = q(n-q(n-1)) + q(n-q(n-2)) for n > 2.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
mathematica: a[1] = a[2] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = a[n - a[n - 1]] + a[n - a[n - 2]]; Table[a[n + 1 - a[n]], {n, 97}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 22 2017 *)
program: (Scheme) (define (A283467 n) (A005185 (- (+ n 1) (A005185 n)))) ;; Code for A005185 given under that entry.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 22 2017
